definition-item.definition-title: JET-PROPULSION PLANTS (features of jet-propulsion plants common to gas-turbine plants, air intakes or fuel supply control of air-breathing jet-propulsion plants F02C7/00, F02C9/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Features of jet-propulsion plants common to gas-turbine plants, air intakes or fuel supply control of air-breathing jet-propulsion plants

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangement or mounting of jet-propulsion plants in land vehicles or vehicles in general
Arrangement or mounting of jet-propulsion plants in waterborne vessels
Controlling aircraft attitude, flight direction or altitude by jet reaction
Arrangement or mounting of jet-propulsion plants in aircraft
Plants characterised by the power of the working fluid being divided between jet propulsion and another form of propulsion, e.g. propeller

section-body.paragraph-text: In this subclass the Indexing Code scheme F05D is used as follows:
F05D2200/00 Mathematical features
F05D2210/00 Working fluid
F05D2220/00 Application
F05D2230/00 Manufacture
F05D2240/00 Components
F05D2250/00 Geometry
F05D2260/00 Function
F05D2270/00 Control
F05D2300/00 Materials
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: means plants using combustion to produce a fluid stream from which a propulsive thrust on the plant is obtained on the reaction principle
means the exhaust duct of a jet engine that carries the exhaust to the nozzle

definition-item.definition-title: Plants characterised by the form or arrangement of the jet pipe or nozzle; Jet pipes or nozzles peculiar thereto (rocket nozzles F02K9/97)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {with means to modify the direction of thrust vector (F02K1/54 takes precedence; thrust vectoring of rockets F02K9/80)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Nozzles having means for reversing jet thrust

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Infrared radiation suppressors}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {Sound absorbing structures or liners}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Plants including a gas turbine driving a compressor or a ducted fan

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mainly ducted gas turbine plants with ducted fans, whereby the main flow which is only slightly compressed by a fan or the like bypasses the core engine; Heating of the bypass flow; Afterburners.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: with counter-rotating {, e.g. fan} rotors

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Axial flow pumps for elastic fluids with counter-rotating parts

definition-item.definition-title: with supplementary heating of the working fluid; Control thereof (control of fuel supply therefor F02C9/26)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Heating of the working fluid, e.g. main working fluid or bypass flow, by heat exchangers or burners. These include after-burners.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Plants including an engine, other than a gas turbine, driving a compressor or a ducted fan

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Plants including an engine, other than a gas turbine, driving a compressor or a ducted fan.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Plants in which the working fluid is used in a jet only, i.e. the plants not having a turbine or other engine driving a compressor or a ducted fan; Control thereof (rocket-engine plants F02K9/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rocket- engine plants, i.e. plants carrying both fuel and oxidant therefor; Control thereof

abbreviations.paragraph-text: In patent documents, the following abbreviations are often used:

table-column.paragraph-text: Compression of the working fluid caused by the engine's forward motion without a rotary compressor

definition-item.definition-title: {the engine comprising a rotor rotating under the actions of jets issuing from this rotor}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Rotating rotors rotating due to the reaction force of the jets issued from the rotor.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: With pressure velocity transformation exclusively in rotor, e.g. the rotor rotating under the influence of jets issuing from the rotor
Rotating combustion chamber with the working fluid being a combustion product

definition-item.definition-title: Rocket-engine plants, i.e. plants carrying both fuel and oxidant therefor; Control thereof

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Rocket-engine plant related aspects such as solid and liquid propellant rocket plants; Constructional details of the charges; Supply and feeding of propellant; Starting and restarting.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: using solid propellants (F02K9/72 takes precedence; using semi-solid or pulverulent propellants F02K9/70)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Solid propellant rocket plants.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Using liquid and solid propellants, i.e. hybrid rocket-engine plants

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Explosives or thermic compositions; Manufacture thereof; Use of single substances as explosives
Means for generating smoke or mist; Gas-attack compositions; Generation of gas for blasting or propulsion (Chemical part)
Cartridges for producing gas under pressure

definition-item.definition-title: Constructional parts; Details not otherwise provided for

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Solid propellant construction parts and details including: casings, liners, joints, seals, propellant supports, safety devices, and cooling arrangements.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Shape or structure of solid propellant charges
Starting or ignition means or arrangements

definition-item.definition-title: {Propellants}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Specific types of liquid or gaseous propellants, e.g. hypergolic propellants, methane, hydrogen peroxide.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Explosives or thermic compositions; Manufacture thereof; Use of single substance as explosive
Means for generating smoke or mist; Gas-attack compositions; Generation of gas blasting or propulsion (Chemical part)

definition-item.definition-title: using pumps

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Feeding propellants by the use of pumps, e.g. turbo-pumps.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Injectors

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Injectors for liquid or gaseous propellants.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Leakage detectors; Purging systems; Filtration systems

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Propellant feed valves

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Control of rocket propellant feed valves.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Constructional parts; Details not otherwise provided for

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Constructional parts or details of liquid or gaseous propellant rockets such as reservoirs, combustion chambers, decomposition chambers.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Starting or ignition means or arrangements
